import React from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import '../style.css' const Cart = () => { const selector = useSelector(state => state) const dispatch = useDispatch() const cartProducts = selector.cartProducts return (
{cartProducts.length > 0 ? cartProducts.map(item =>

{item.name}

Color: {item.color}
{item.inCart}

{item.price}L

):

Cart Is Empty

}
) } export default Cart
